elements.name: I want to add a new trip

steps.name: I make a authorized POST request to :trips
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to get trip details

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is /0/_id from a result
I make a authorized GET request to :trips/[trip_id]

elements.name: I want to add transport to the trip

steps.name: I define that origin is "Hong Kong"
I define that destination is "Chiang Mai"
I make a GET request to :cities/[origin]
I define that origin_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a GET request to :cities/[destination]
I define that destination_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a authorized POST request to :trips/[trip_id]/transport
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to update transport of a trip

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is 0/_id from a result
I define that transport_id is 0/transport/0/_id from a result
I define that origin_id is 0/transport/0/origin_id from a result
I define that destination_id is 0/transport/0/destination_id from a result
I define that departure is 0/transport/0/departure from a result
I define that arrival is 0/transport/0/arrival from a result
I make a authorized POST request to :trips/[trip_id]/transport/[transport_id]
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to remove transport from a trip

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is 0/_id from a result
I define that transport_id is 0/transport/0/_id from a result
I make a authorized DELETE request to :trips/[trip_id]/transport/[transport_id]
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to update a trip

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is /0/_id from a result
I make a authorized POST request to :trips/[trip_id]
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to remove a trip

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is /0/_id from a result
I make a authorized DELETE request to :trips/[trip_id]
success equals true in a result
